website_summaries.verdict: A system with stronger correction intensity settings than traditional invisible fence systems; designed for harder-to-train dogs.
pros: Offers audible warning tones for owners when dog approaches boundary
Can work with multiple pets, although you'd need separate receivers for each pet

customer_reviews.title: it WORKS
customer_reviews.text: this fence works amazingly well. A neighbor cat wanders around my yard all the time teasing my 2 big dogs AND deer run across the back yard but my dogs will not leave the yard. Crazy but the fence stops the dogs dead in their tracks! I love this product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy Buhr

customer_reviews.title: Dogs learned boundary real fast
customer_reviews.text: This works great on our ten acre lot. We ran 3500 foot make different zones for our dogs around the garden and the chicken coop and the perimetert of the property. We just zip tied the wire onto the fence about 2 foot off the ground. Haven’t had any issues yet.
customer_reviews.author: Fna

customer_reviews.title: Problem solved!!!
customer_reviews.text: If you're a DIY person like me, PetSafe is absolutely the way to go!!! I've tried several brands. PROBLEM SOLVED!! It's simple to install, the main box is simple to use and works great! The collars stay on the dogs and work even through all the ROUGH playing. Know you breeds and how heavy a gaged wire you will need. Have a "STUBBORN" sports dog like me? (Labs, Short hairs and Pits) There is a "sports dog" wire (HEAVY DUTY STUFF) made specifically for Petsafe. BUY THAT WITH THE "PETSAFE" SYSTEM. TIP: Buy rechargeable batteries and change every 3 days for 6-8weeks. Then change weekly.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Goddard

customer_reviews.title: This fence works great. We can now let our 2 black labs ...
customer_reviews.text: This fence works great. We can now let our 2 black labs out without supervision. We did order the device WITHOUT the wire and used a sturdier 14 gauge solid core wire. I love this system, the dogs don't.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well, but batteries are only lasting about a ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well, but batteries are only lasting about a month. Major pain to change since you have to remove four screws.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... for about a month now and I am very pleased with the results
customer_reviews.text: Mine has been installed for about a month now and I am very pleased with the results. Installation was very straightforward with the detailed manual (included). I opted or 14 gauge wire which is pretty stiff. The leads can pull right out of the terminals with little effort so be sure to plan in some stress relief for the wire near the unit.
customer_reviews.author: dave

customer_reviews.title: Good product so far, needs a loop on the collar on which to hang dog tags.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. We’ve been using it a few weeks and our two dogs, who are experienced with e fencing seem to be aware of the “tones” and staying inside their area. It was easy to install. I would have liked to have a way to out their tags on their collars, thereis no place or loop for that, had to create our own.
customer_reviews.author: tresjax

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this and the wire seperate because I wanted thicker wire than the bundle had. The signal is constant all 700 feet and we never had to use anything past the vibrate setting because of prior training with a shock collar.
customer_reviews.author: Tj

customer_reviews.title: Maybe I got a lemon
customer_reviews.text: Works when not broken. Lasted about four months now once a day I have to do a loop test to reset it otherwise it doesn’t work
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Hard headed hound!
customer_reviews.text: So far she has crossed the line three times. Evidently stubborn dog doesn’t include 4 month old walker hounds. I’m sure she will get the idea with a little more work.
customer_reviews.author: jeff

customer_reviews.title: Very bulky
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! We trained our 4 month old German Shepherd with this! The only thing I don’t like about this is that the box is so bulky, thick and heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Becca

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof
customer_reviews.text: While it says waterproof, the collar has severe water damage inside the unit. It isn't working at all. One piece inside came off completely. I only started using it about 2 months ago.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Mooney

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Garbage. Less than 2 months and it does not work anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: This system works great for my LGD
customer_reviews.text: This system works great for my LGD. With in days she already knew the boundary and would not come close to it. Very happy with our purcahse
customer_reviews.author: Aaron K. Stumbaugh

customer_reviews.title: Collar battery in description is wrong.
customer_reviews.text: Description says uses 9v battery collar but collar actually uses Petsafe proprietary RF-67D battery. Rest of system is great and dogs haven't run out yet (used to be weekly event).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Need instructions
customer_reviews.text: Missing the instructions. How do I get a replacement instruction book?
customer_reviews.author: pamela marra

customer_reviews.title: Wont work on stubborn dogs
customer_reviews.text: My dog went right thru it so unless you have a small puppy to train to this its useless
customer_reviews.author: jessica

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: love this, I no longer have to worry about the dog getting out of the yard
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No wire
customer_reviews.text: I was very unsatisfied with this product it does not tell you that there is a wire needed to install and that the wire is also sold separately. Will be requesting a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Person

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They had my package there in 2 days. I installed it. It is working perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Gary Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Poor working device
customer_reviews.text: After a month of use I've found that it sometimes works, and sometimes doesn't. I've used it with two different PetSafe collars with the same results. I will be attempting to rejigger it for better results, but for now I will have to stick with a leash for my ambitious husky.
customer_reviews.author: J. Baldwin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Keeps my very stubborn Border Collie in the yard. He ran through it only one time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Return
customer_reviews.text: This is the wrong one. I need to send back
customer_reviews.author: nicci

customer_reviews.title: So far after 3 months working great
customer_reviews.text: So far this product is working awesome I had a have heart system before and it failed within a year.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Very detailed manual included
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the petsafe stubborn dog fence collar and control panel for a house that already has the fence installed. The manual that came with the control panel lists directions step by step on how to connect it to the outside wires. The book also gives a 30 day training guide listing what I should do with my dog each day in order to train him to use the fence! This is extremely helpful since I have never used an underground fence before!!
customer_reviews.author: Moonbeam

customer_reviews.title: My beagle has NEVER got through the line!
customer_reviews.text: After using it for 2 months now my Beagle has never once broken through the line!!!!! I used a standard recharable one at first but the dogs would always get though and after it broke the 2nd time I decided to try this product and its great! I have recommended to friends and family and they have had the same great experience!
customer_reviews.author: zapperman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Product was fine but wouldn't work for my application return was very easy
customer_reviews.author: Bruce T

customer_reviews.title: Hard to put in but works
customer_reviews.text: Took a whole weekend to put in. Lots of work but it is worth it. Only had it on for a couple of weeks. Dog learn boundaries of the yard quick and don't usually have it on. Great way to teach dog boundaries.
customer_reviews.author: Marc Navy

customer_reviews.title: stubboron carin terrier tamed
customer_reviews.text: easy to install. very good instructions. did not bury the wire, but instead layed it on the surface. 2 spools of 500' wire and i have a 2 acre zone for the dog. he is a tough little carin and very stubborn. a couple encounters at the lowest setting made a believer out of him. he now has full run of 2 acres of woodland.
customer_reviews.author: joe meiman

customer_reviews.title: I love it. Works perfectly and he stays in the ...
customer_reviews.text: Installed this system for my Sheppard. I love it. Works perfectly and he stays in the yard.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher L Gamache

customer_reviews.title: ad is deceiving, this is not a wireless system ...
customer_reviews.text: ad is deceiving, this is not a wireless system you need wire which is not with it, you need to spend more to get it.
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: Works well. Took a few hours to install. ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Took a few hours to install. We did purchase the extra surge protector that does not come with along with the wire.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Mowry

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install has long has you do it in ...
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install has long has you do it in early spring or fall. Simple instructions on how to lay the line out.. the one draw back is my dog is now scared to go outside.. I'm going to give him some time then we will go try again.
customer_reviews.author: im me

product_meta.title: PetSafe Stubborn Dog In-Ground Fence for Dogs and Cats - from The Parent Company of Invisible Fence Brand – Boundary Wire Not Included – Pick Your Wire Gauge Separately
product_meta.description: Persistent pup? Hard-headed or hard of hearing? Now you can still keep them playing safely in the yard—and nowhere else—with the PetSafe Stubborn Dog In-Ground Fence Kit. This bundle allows you to choose your own wire (sold separately) and comes with everything else you need to create a secure boundary for your furry friend. The Stubborn Dog In-Ground Fence and receiver collar work together to keep even the most determined pets in the yard. The collar features 5 levels of electrical static correction at our highest intensity level, as well as a tone plus vibration mode that is perfect for hearing-impaired dogs. The collar is designed for pets 8 pounds and up and adjusts to fit neck sizes between 6-28 inches. If you have more than one dog, you can contain an unlimited number of pets by purchasing additional PetSafe In-Ground Fence receiver collars. PetSafe brand is here to help you and your pet LIVE HAPPY TOGETHER.
feature_bullets: FOR STUBBORN DOGS: The system features the highest intensity of static correction with 5 levels of correction as well as a tone plus vibration mode; this system is designed for pets 8 pounds and up
CHOOSE YOUR WIRE: In-ground wire is sold separately so that you can purchase the gauge best for your yard; PetSafe offers Standard (20 Gauge) and Heavy Duty (16 Gauge) in varying lengths
RUN-THROUGH PREVENTION: The correction level will increase if your pet tries to run through the boundary zone; an automatic safety shut-off will stop correction after 30 seconds
FOR HEARING-IMPAIRED DOGS: The tone plus vibration mode is ideal for training hearing-impaired dogs
WATERPROOF COLLAR: The battery-operated, waterproof collar is submersible up to 3 feet; collar adjusts to fit neck sizes 6-28 inches
CONTAIN ALL YOUR PETS: With the purchase of additional collars, this in-ground fence system allows you to safely contain an unlimited number of pets
ADJUSTABLE CORRECTION: The collar features 4 levels of adjustable static correction plus a tone-only mode which is perfect for training
U.S.-BASED CUSTOMER CARE: Let our pet product experts help; we’re available Monday through Saturday to answer your questions at 1-800-845-3274
